urls.title: Newsroom - Fire latest - Update 5.39pm Sunday 9 May
urls.description: *** UPDATED 5.39pm Sunday 9 May *** The latest on the large scale fire at Greenway Polymers. We will keep this page updated with the latest news Latest: Air quality monitoring: Status update (Friday, May 7) ‚Ä¢ residents should minimise their exposure to any smoke and keep their medication with them. The public health advice therefore remains unchanged ‚Äìresidents in areas affected by smoke are advised to stay indoors, keep their doors and windows closed while smoke is visible. However, we would recommend

urls.title: United Utilities - <Work completed to protect homes from flooding>
urls.description: External flooding of homes in Rock View, Sefton should soon be a thing of the past, thanks to work that‚Äôs been completed by United Utilities.

tweets.text: A major sewer upgrade project is nearing completion in #MySefton, which should prevent the risk of external flooding to a number of homes. We‚Äôll continue to work with @seftoncouncil and @ENVAgencyNW to explore more solutions to reduce the risk of flooding. https://t.co/8sQ69XFRpQ https://t.co/7Qap8s8TO8

Today outside #WalleysQuarrey we left tributes to a life lost to bad decisions, ineptitude, greed, and power. @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @RedIndustries2 @PHE_uk We Will Not Rest In Peace #stopthestink @SianieRoo @StinkStopthe https://t.co/pRTxLO8XsX

urls.title: Environment Agency launches educational tools for WOD to ‚Äòhelp marine life thrive‚Äô - Preventing Plastic Pollution
urls.description: Schools across England will mark World Ocean Day (WOD) next month (Tuesday, June 8) by exploring the journey of plastic with the Environment Agency. Primary and secondary schools are invited to view a series of online films and activities via an interactive map in advance of the event, culminating in a live question and answer sessio n with Environment Agency and World Wildlife Fund experts on the actual day. By clicking on different points of the map, students can learn how plastic pollution travels
